weather_report:
In the calm of the early morning, San Francisco awakens under a blanket of clarity, like a quiet promise of an inviting day ahead. The city, with its iconic hills and waterways, holds the whisper of warmth and sun against a soft breeze drifting from the southwest. Currently, a gentle 58 degrees cradles all who venture outside, hinting at the comfort of a light jacket or a sweater before the sun climbs higher. As dawn unfolds, the forecast predicts a joyous embrace of sunshine, nudging the temperature to a pleasant 71 degrees by midday. 

Though the marine layer may linger in the outskirts, its influence is subtle today, allowing for a canvas of blue to dominate the skyline. The fleeting whispers of fog retreat to the embrace of the ocean, leaving room for exploration. With a hint of dynamism in the air—courtesy of gusts peaking at 30 mph—this bright day beckons one to the parks, perhaps a stroll along the Embarcadero or a relaxed moment in Golden Gate Park, where nature thrives. Attire should blend comfort with a nod to the cool side of the day; perhaps a light shirt, layered with a sweater, will suit the shifting temperatures beautifully. On this day, embrace the moment in the city, taking a gentle walk or simply pausing with a book at a local café.
